Invocation for when you find something b.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ لاَ سَهْلَ إِلاَّ مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً)).
Invocation for when you find something b.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma la sahla illa ma jaAAaltahu sahla, wa-anta tajAAalul- hazana in shi'ta sahla.)
Invocation for when you find something b.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, there is no ease except in that which You have made easy, and You make the difficulty, if You wish, easy.)
